EmailTemplate.name: Preferred Offers.Email 3.11-12-20 BNK Preferred Offers Campaign Email 3
EmailTemplate.subject: See how Tampa Bay Federal Credit Union used NCR Preferred Offers
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
NCR’s SelfServ™ Preferred Offers program gives you simple and easy access to a selection of pre-configured ATMs. Meaning you can get the latest self-service experience to your customers, fast.
Don’t just take our word for it. Check out how NCR Preferred Offers helped Tampa Bay Federal Credit Union accelerate their branch transformation. Preferred Offers allowed them to ramp up the deployment of ITMs. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
